problem: 如图,AB与⊙O相切于点C,OA=OB,⊙O的半径为3cm,AB=8cm,则OA=()
answer: 解:连接OC；∵AB与⊙O相切于点C,∴OC⊥AB,∵OA=OB,∴AC=BC=4cm,在Rt△AOC中,OA=√{AC^{2}+OC^{2}}=√{4^{2}+3^{2}}=5(cm)．故选:C．
comment: 本题考查了切线与圆的位置关系,利用勾股定理求解直角三角形的知识．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, AB is tangent to ⊙O at point C, OA = OB, the radius of ⊙O is N_0, AB = N_1, then OA = ()
